notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: All authors have no potential conflict of interest.

notes.title: Statements on human and animal rights
notes.p: All procedures performed in this study involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Ethics Committee of Peking University First Hospital research committee and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

notes.title: Informed consent
notes.p: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants included in this study.
